text: Christmas Remixed is a Christmas compilation and remix album, containing remixes of popular classic versions of Christmas songs. == Release == The album was released in 2003 by Six Degrees Records on October 21, 2003. A follow-up album, Christmas Remixed 2, was released in 2005. A third album, Christmas Remixed 3, was released in 2018 to celebrate the 15th anniversary of the series.|url=https://www.sixdegreesrecords.com/christmas-remixed-3 == Critical reception == The album elicited a positive critical reaction upon its release. AllMusic's Rick Anderson awarded the album 3.5 stars, commenting that "there will probably not be a better new Christmas album this year than this one," going on to call the album "a complete blast" and stating that "this album is very highly recommended." == Commercial performance == The album debuted at number 21 on the Billboard's "Top Dance/Electronic Albums" chart dated December 6, 2003. The following week, it rose six spots to number 16.\- Top Electronic Albums - Chart Listing For The Week Of Dec 13 2003 The next week, it rose another seven spots to enter the top ten,\- Top Electronic Albums - Chart Listing For The Week Of Dec 20 2003 before peaking at number 5 on the chart dated December 27, 2003.Billboard.com - Top Electronic Albums - Chart Listing For The Week Of Dec 27 2003 The album spent a total of six weeks on the chart. == Track listing == # Andy Williams - "It's the Most Wonderful Time of the Year" (A Shrift Remix) - 3:46 # Bing Crosby - " Happy Holiday" (Beef Wellington Remix) - 4:10 # Dean Martin - "Jingle Bells" (Dan the Automator Remix) - 3:19 # Kay Starr - "I've Got My Love To Keep Me Warm" (Stuhr Remix) - 2:49 # The Cathedral Brass - "Joy to the World" (Mocean Worker Remix) - 3:24 # Johnny Mercer - "Winter Wonderland" (Rise Ashen's Brazilian Beach Mix) - 4:06 # Charles Brown - "Merry Christmas Baby" (MNO Remix) - 3:44 # Berlin Symphony Orchestra - "Nutcracker Suite" (Baz Kuts Breaks Mix) - 4:59 # Louis Armstrong & Velma Middleton - "Baby, It's Cold Outside" (Mulato Beat Remix) - 4:18 # Duke Ellington - "Jingle Bells" (Robbie Hardkiss Remix) - 4:12 # Bing Crosby - "The First Noel" (Attaboy House Party Mix) - 3:52 # Mel Tormé - "The Christmas Song" (Michael Kessler Open Fire Mix) - 5:15 == Credits and personnel == Adapted from AllMusic and album liner notes."Christmas Remixed" liner notes Remixing *Attaboy *Dan the Automator *Robbie Hardkiss *Michael Kessler *Mocean Worker *MNO *Rise Ashen *Stuhr Production *Doug Bernheim *Jeff Daniel *Billy Straus *David Hargis A&R; *Robert Duskis == Charts == {| class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2003) !Peak position |- |US Top Dance/Electronic Albums |align="center"|5 |} == References == ==External links== * Hear the album on Spotify Category:Christmas compilation albums Category:2003 compilation albums Category:2003 Christmas albums Category:2003 remix albums
title: Christmas Remixed
